org.drip.product.credit

Class Bond

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.common.Component
        • org.drip.product.common.CalibratableComponent
          • org.drip.product.credit.CreditComponent
            • org.drip.product.credit.Bond
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentMarketParamRef

    public class Bond
extends CreditComponent
    This is the base class that extends CreditComponent abstract class and implements the functionality behind bonds of all kinds. Bond static data is captured in a set of 11 container classes – BondTSYParams, BondCouponParams, BondNotionalParams, BondFloaterParams, BondCurrencyParams, BondIdentifierParams, BondIRValuationParams, CompCRValParams, BondCFTerminationEvent, BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams, and one EmbeddedOptionSchedule object instance each for the call and the put objects. Each of these parameter set can be set separately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bond.BondCalibrator
      The BondCalibrator implements a calibrator that calibrates the yield, the credit basis, or the Z Spread for the bond given the price input.

        Parameters:
        valParams - ValuationParams
        mktParams - Bond market parameters
        quotingParams - Bond Quoting parameters
        dblWorkoutDate - JulianDate work-out
        dblWorkoutFactor - Work-out factor
        dblYield - Yield to work-out input
        Returns:
        Calculated Yield Spread from yield to work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the Yield Spread cannot be calculated

        dblWorkoutDate - JulianDate work-out
        dblWorkoutFactor - Work-out factor
        dblZSpread - Z Spread to Work-out input
        Returns:
        Calculated Bond Basis from Z Spread to Work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the Bond Basis cannot be calculated

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the convexity cannot be calculated

        mktParams - Bond market parameters
        quotingParams - Bond Quoting parameters
        dblBondBasis - Bond Basis to exercise input
        Returns:
        Calculated par ASW from Bond Basis to exercise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the par ASW cannot be calculated

                                         double dblYieldSpread)

        Parameters:

                                 double dblWorkoutFactor,
                                 double dblCreditBasis)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception

        mktParams - Bond market parameters

        mktParams - Bond market parameters
        dblPECS - PECS to Exercise input
        Returns:
        Calculated Credit Basis from PECS to Exercise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the Credit Basis cannot be calculated

        dblTSYSpread - The spread treasury benchmark to Work-out input
        Returns:
        Calculated Discount Margin from the spread treasury benchmark to Work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the Discount Margin cannot be calculated

      • calcDiscountMarginFromTSYSpread

        dblGSpread - The Credit Basis to Maturity input
        Returns:
        Calculated I Spread from the G Spread to Maturity
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the I Spread cannot be calculated

        dblISpread - The I Spread to Work-out input
        Returns:
        Calculated G Spread from the I Spread to Work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the G Spread cannot be calculated
